decisions.description: Case Status is 'Waiting for Customer Response' and WOC Reason is 'Call Back' and Business Group is either 'CORE' or 'MSP' or 'SONIAN'
decisions.name: Check_WOC_Reason_and_Business_Group
decisions.label: Check WOC Reason and Business Group

rules.name: New_Case_Notification_Non_alt_emails
rules.label: New Case Notification - Non alt emails

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_Core_or_Sonian
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - Core or Sonian

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_MSP
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 10 AND 11

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - MSP

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_Core_or_Sonian_No_CSAT2
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - Core or Sonian - No CSAT

rules.name: Case_Resolved_Notification_MSP_No_CSAT2
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND 10 AND 11 AND 12

rightValue.stringValue: Couldn't contact customer (after at least 3 attempts)
Customer rebooted before troubleshooting was possible, issue gone

rules.label: Case Resolved Notification - MSP - No CSAT
